name: Chocolate Dream Pie
author: Shirley Drury

ingredients.name: pkg. Jell-O brand chocolate or other flavor instant pudding

instructions: Prepare whipped topping mix as directed on package, using 1 cup milk and 1 teaspoon vanilla, in large mixing bowl. Add remaining 1 3/4 cup milk and pudding mix. Whip, then beat at high speed for 2 minutes, scraping bowl occasionally. Spoon into pie shell. Chill at least 4 hours.
